page.title: 02Mrs.C.L.Stokes her day cont
page.content: news was forthcoming but the day seemed brighter and far from boring. 1.00-4.00 Received various phone calls (PTA,my employer,friends,relatives). Delt with matters arising from the phone calls, interspersed by visitors, further phone calls and bulletins on the still continuing local dispute. Tracked down prescription lost in earlier confusion. Comforted a friend in need. 4.00 Abruptly interrupted by my son, soaked and petrified by a storm. 4.00- 8.00 Dried, comforted and fed my children. Refered their disputes and solved their problems, interrupted by phone calls and visits prompted by a PTA meeting scheduled for that evening. 8.00-10.00 Completed outstanding matters arrising from calls earlier that day. 9.30 My husband arrived home after late duty. 10.30 Sleep!
